content:
/>
III.ii.1.B.3.d
.
When to Use FOLQ
Use FOLQ to obtain or verify a Veteran’s/claimant’s
vital information, such as SSN, address, and/or date of birth and death
Social Security benefit information
unearned income history, and
SSI information.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Requests for Information From the Social Security Administration (SSA)
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
